channel.title: Help with matrix source
channel.description:
So, i've done how to run the Matrix source (omg that was hard L0L0L) for my video.
But, i still have some questions
What are the moderators commands and Admin commands?
I want this so badly because i dont know how to give support rank, and donator/extr donator rank, wich is needed for my video, and i really want to know the commands.
If you now any command, post is please like this:
Moderator - ::(command) - (info)
Thanks, i will rep++ who helps me.
